document_data.name: ''Buckled Knot''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Buckled Knot''''' was an adventurers' marine vessel, based in [[Daggerford]] and active ''circa'' [[1372 DR]].
document_data.History: In 1372 DR, ''Buckled Knot'' was stationed in Daggerford's harbor. The ship actively advertising itself to its potential crew members via the River Quarter notice boards, promising adventures and journeys on the high seas.
